chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: System
extendsPA: Included Formula PA T
repT: Formula
v0: nat
freeVarRepT: forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0
expressT1: forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))
expressT2: forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))))

Goal:
forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN T' f -> SysPrf T (LNN2LNT_formula f)

Premises:
natToTerm = fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end : nat -> Term Arguments natToTerm _%nat_scope
PA = Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) PA6 : Ensemble Formula
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNT : fol.System LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> Prop
notH = fol.notH LNT : fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
codeFormula = code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation : fol.Formula LNT -> nat
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
LNN2LNT_formula = fix LNN2LNT_formula (f : fol.Formula LNN) : Formula := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => equal (LNN2LNT_term t1) (LNN2LNT_term t2) | @atomic _ r ts => match r as l return (fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl l)) -> Formula) with | LT => fun t0 : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => translateLT t0 end ts | @fol.impH _ A B => impH
Module folProof := Struct Definition nVars : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), Terms L n * Terms L n. Definition AxmEq4 : forall L : Language, Relations L -> Formula L. Definition AxmEq5 : forall L : Language, Functions L -> Formula L. Inductive Prf (L : Language) : Formulas L -> Formula L -> Set := AXM : forall A : Formula L, Prf L (A :: nil) A | MP : forall (Axm1 Axm2 : Formulas L) (A B : Formula L), Prf L Axm1 (impH L
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
T' = Union (fol.Formula LNN) NN (fun x : fol.Formula LNN => mem (fol.Formula LNT) T (LNN2LNT_formula x)) : fol.System LNN
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f ->...-> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f ->...-> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]
expressT'2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> folProof.SysPrf LNN T' (fol.notH LNN (substituteFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0 (natToTermLNN (codeFormula f))))
expressT'1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> folProof.SysPrf LNN T' (substituteFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0 (natToTermLNN (codeFormula f)))
translatePrf : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))) -> forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (axm : fol.Formulas LNN), Prf LNN axm f -> (forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) U g) -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2...

codeSysPfCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f)))
codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfNCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> forall codeArityRIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityR, (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> forall T : LNN.System, Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T -> forall (U : fol.System L) (fU : LNN.Formula) (v0 : nat), (forall v : nat, In v (free...
codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf L codeF codeR A f p)))
translateProof : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), ClosedSystem LNT V -> (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
Tprf2T'prf : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T f -> folProof.SysPrf LNN T' (LNT2LNN_formula f)
induct : forall (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf PA (substituteFormula LNT f v Zero) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v (impH f (substituteFormula LNT f v (Succ (var v))))) -> SysPrf PA (forallH v f)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
LNN2LNT_subFormula : forall (T : System) (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), SysPrf T (iffH (LNN2LNT_formula (substituteFormula LNN f v s)) (substituteFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f) v (LNN2LNT_term s)))
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
PAboundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf PA (substituteFormula LNT a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf PA (impH (LNN2LNT_formula (LNN.LT (fol.var LNN x) (LNN.natToTerm m))) a)
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
NN2PA : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN NN f -> SysPrf PA (LNN2LNT_formula f)
subFormulaNil : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
subWithEquals : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (a b : fol.Term L) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.equal L a b) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L (substituteFormula L f v a) (substituteFormula L f v b))

```coq
intros f Pf.
apply translateProof with (U:=T') (V:=T).
- apply extendsPA.
- intros g Pg.
  apply Pf.
- apply Pf.
Qed.
```
